title: Digital Game-Based Vocabulary Learning Program (ARCS-SRL Integrated Model)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Smartphones serve as the primary learning tool, requiring a flexible learning structure compatible with work commitments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-directed vocabulary learning strategies utilizing ARCS motivational elements (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction) in game-based learning environments
Learners can acquire over 100 job-related core vocabulary items per week with 80%+ accuracy through mobile games over one week
Learners can establish and execute personalized learning plans using in-game self-regulation tools (progress tracking, time management)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
